summary: Frontend testing for static pages (FAQ, Contact, Safety Tips), footer links, and homepage features complete. All requested features working correctly.

issues: data-testid attributes defined in code but not rendering in DOM on web - likely React Native Web limitation. Functionality works correctly.

critical_code_review_comments: FAQ page properly implements accordion-style expandable sections with 5 categories: Getting Started, Buying & Selling, Account & Profile, Credits & Promotions, Safety & Security
Contact page has complete contact form with Name, Email, Subject, Message fields and Quick Contact options (Email Support, Live Chat, Phone Support)
Safety Tips page displays all 8 safety guidelines with icons and descriptions
Footer Support links correctly wired: Help Center -> /faq, Safety Tips -> /safety-tips, Contact Us -> /contact
Homepage uses DesktopHeader component with logo, Sign In/Sign Up buttons, Post Listing button, search bar, location selector, and category pills
Location selector modal opens correctly and shows 'Browse locations...' dropdown and 'All Locations' option
Category pills navigate to correct category pages (e.g., Electronics -> /category/electronics)
Search bar navigation works correctly (search query -> /search?q=...)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All static pages (FAQ, Contact, Safety Tips) tested and working. Footer links properly wired to correct routes. Homepage DesktopHeader integration verified with location selector, search bar, and category pills all functioning correctly.
